creator: fabien@coelho.net
text:
For some obscure reason, the --enable-module=most configuration does
not include the "mod_usertrack" module, which could be include as it
is a rather small module.

creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
text:
Can you suggest why it should? Most is a synonym for widely used modules, ie,
ones that are used by the majority of apache sites. Usertrack doesn't fill this
description. Size is not an issue that is looked at.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text: No further response, so closing this bug.
